name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CaptchaSonic: BLS Captcha Solver & Auto Captcha Bypass tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fastest Ai Solutions, Solve BLS Captchas Easily with CaptchaSonic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CaptchaSonic: BLS CAPTCHA Solver Extension for Chrome 

Ai based Captcha Solver extension designed specifically to help solve BLS Captcha's and bypass them with machine learning. Helps peoples disabilities and accessibility challenges bypass CAPTCHAs during their daily web browsing.

Official CaptchaSonic browser extension - best and fastest browser captcha solver (based on AI)

Features:
- Solve unlimited BLS Captcha
- No interruptions while browsing
- Uses latest standards and extension service worker for requests
- Small extension size and runs smooth

How to use:
1)  Simply install CaptchaSonic BLS Captcha Solver extension
2) Simply paste your APIKEY from my.captchasonic.com on the popup
3) keep browsing, extension detects BLS Captcha on any page and automatically solve the challenges.
4) Upgrade plan for premium usage limit at my.captchasonic.com

How to solve BLS Captcha with CaptchaSonic and Puppeteer/ Playwright/ Selenium:
a) Extract "CaptchaSonic BLS Captcha Browser Extension.zip".
b) Navigate to extracted folder and look for "/assets/defaultConfig.json".
c) Edit "defaultConfig.json", paste APIKEY, save.
d) Then open the Chrome browser
e) Visit to the Extensions management page and enable Developer mode.
f)  Remove existing CaptchaSonic Extension. If previously installed
g) Click "Load unpacked", and select the folder you just extracted.

Motivation:
BLS Captcha challenges are a significant burden on various cultural, literacy and other factors and backgrounds where it's complexity, availability of internet impacts the web experience significantly.

- Also for Edge, Brave, Opera, Vivaldi,  Firefox and variants: https://github.com/Captcha-Sonic
- Visit the extension's privacy policy for more information: https://captchasonic.com/privacy
- GitHub for issues & feature requests. https://github.com/Captcha-Sonic/CaptchaSonic-Extension

Permission Declarations:
- tabs : determine which actions are from which tabs
- storage : use to store configuration

Contact Support:
